FROM gcr.io/oss-vdb/worker

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
        google-cloud-sdk-datastore-emulator && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY daemon.json /etc/docker/daemon.json
ENTRYPOINT []
